title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 100.99 - Hale Creek Correctional Facility
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 100.99 - Hale Creek Correctional Facility

State Regulations
(a) There shall be in the department an
institution to be known as the Hale Creek Correctional Facility, which shall be
located in the Town of Johnstown, Fulton County, New York. (b) Hale Creek Correctional Facility shall be
a facility for males 18 years of age or older. (c) Hale Creek shall be classified as a
medium security facility to be used as alcohol and substance abuse treatment
annex for the purpose of providing alcohol and substance abuse treatment, and
as a general confinement facility. Notes

New

York State Register July 22, 2020/Volume XLII, Issue 29, eff. 7/22/2020

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
